item.title: ‘Dragon Quest I & II HD-2D Remake’ Gets A Lovely Launch Trailer
item.description: With the launch of 'Dragon Quest I & II HD-2D Remake' looming, we’ve been graced with a lovely new launch trailer for the game.

item.title: Investors Protest Deforestation As The Amazon Tipping Point Approaches
item.description: Investors managing $3 trillion worth of assets have signed the Belem Investor Statement on Rainforests to support an end to deforestation by 2030 in a...

item.title: Is Nintendo’s London Pop-Up Store Worth A Visit?
item.description: Before it opened on Wednesday, I visited Nintendo’s first European store which is based in west London. Unsurprisingly, I spent far too much money.

item.title: Epomaker’s RT85 Mechanical Keyboard Has A Massive Battery And A Programmable Display

item.title: The WhatsApp $1 Million Hack Mystery — What You Need To Know
item.description: Has WhatsApp been hacked with a $1 million zero-click zero-day exploit? Here’s everything we know so far.
